mapper.select:
/* ContactUsMapper.selectContactUs */
select count(1) over() as total_count , row_number() over(order by contact_id desc ) as rnum , tb.* from ( select contact_id , contact_nm , contact_title , contact_phone , contact_mail , contact_contents , contact_agree , DATE_FORMAT(created_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as created_datetime from tb_contact_us where contact_id like concat(#{id},'%') )tb where 1 = 1
